title: Connectivity RF Hardware Design Engineer
summary: Do you have a passion for taking on big challenges? Do you love pushing the limits of what’s considered feasible? As part of our Wireless Hardware group, you’ll be responsible for bringing groundbreaking wireless connectivity to the world. On this team, you’ll help improve the performance of our products through innovative system-on-chip designs. You and your team will build platform architecture that paves the way for all-new experiences, including the ones that allow people to take advantage of our innovations in sensor technology. Together, our goal is to ensure nothing stands in the way of our customers’ connections with their devices. Join us and help build world-renowned wireless systems that connect customers to their world like never before.
description: Our RF Hardware Design Engineer is an integral member of the Hardware Engineering team designing future wireless products. They will work on a small design team focused on the integration of multiple wireless technologies into a new Apple product. For a full product cycle, our experienced DRI (directly responsible individual) is expected to own their technology from concept through product introduction.  This includes front-end architecture, component specification, line-up spreadsheets and modeling, design implementation, validation, production test coverage, failure analysis and all the multi-functional work required to accomplish this. They will work proactively with other cross-functional engineering groups such as antenna design, industrial design, product design, production test, regulatory, reliability, and software engineering.
key_qualifications:
Experience with RF component and circuit integration into consumer products
M.S.E.E is preferred (not required)
Fluent in one or more connectivity wireless system like WiFi, Bluetooth, UWB or NFC
Must be an excellent communicator, both written and oral
Must be able to interact closely with offshore engineering development and manufacturing partners
Successful track record of delivering highly innovative, and high quality communications products
Be well organized and have the ability to be flexible in a changing work environment
International travel as needed (10%)
education_experience: B.S. and 3+ years of relevant industry experience
